description: A yummy brunch or lunch box favourite. Delicious hot or cold!
keywords: Vegetable dishes,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sweet potato,Egg,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Curried Egg & Vegetable Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a fan forced oven to 180 degrees. And line or grease a slice tray.
Beat together 6 eggs and slowly add in the flour.
Add bacon, grated zucchini, sweet potato, onion and half of the cheese. Stir to combine.
Add curry powder and salt and pepper to taste.
Pour into lined/greased tray and top with remaining cheese.
Bake for 25 minutes. Slice will be ready when it is golden brown and firm to touch.
Allow to cool, slice into 12 slices and serve with aioli either warm or chilled. Enjoy!
